ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
  wordCount: o('._tags strong:eq(3)').replace(/\s|字/g,''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*[】）\)]/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

searchUrl:
<js> 
//注意：一般网站默认首页(即baseUrl)有搜索框，否则请填入搜索页面地址
var url = baseUrl;
if (!baseUrl.match(/^https?:/i)) {
    java.log('\n\n\n\n‼️请填入正确的Url‼️\n\n\n\n');
}
var html = java.ajax(url + ",{'webView': true}");
//java.log(html);
var doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
var form = doc.select('form[action]:not([name~=login]):not([class~=login]):not([id~=login])')[0];
//java.log(form);
var method = form.attr('method');
var action = form.attr('action');
var charset = doc.select('head>meta[charset]').attr('charset');
if (charset == '')
{
    charset = String(doc.select('head>meta[content~=charset=]').attr('content')).replace(/^.*charset=([a-z0-9\-]+).*$/i, 
    '$1');
}
//java.log(method);
//java.log(action);
//java.log(charset);
//桌面版UA
var uaw = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36";
//手机版UA
var uam = "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 7.0; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/48.0.2564.116 Mobile Safari/537.36 T7/10.3 SearchCraft/2.6.2 (baiduboxapp; P1 7.0)";
var headers = {
    //请自行选择UA，↓↓↓填入此处
    "User-Agent" : uam, "Referer" : String(baseUrl)
};
url = baseUrl.replace(/([^\/])$/i, '$1/') + String(action).replace(/^\//, '');
var body = '';
var option = {};
var sk = form.select('input[name][type="text"],input[name][class="text"]').attr('name');
//java.log(sk);
var es = form.select('input[name]:not([type="submit"])');
for (var it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.attr('value');
    if (k == sk) {
        //body+=sk+'={{java.encodeURI(key,\''+ charset+'\');}}&';
        body += sk + '={{key}}&';
    }
    else {
        body += k + '=' + v + '&';
    }
}
es = form.select('select[name]');
for (it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.select('option')[0].attr('value');
    body += k + '=' + v + '&';
}
body = String(body).replace(/&$/, '');
java.log(body);
if (method.match(/post/i))
{
    option = 
    {
        "charset" : String(charset), "method" : String(method), "body" : String(body), "headers" : headers, 
        "webView" : true 
    };
    url += ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
else
{
    //get
    option = {
        "charset" : String(charset), "headers" : headers, "webView" : true 
    };
    url += '?' + body + ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
java.log(url);
</js>

<js>
content = java.getString("@@class.articleContent@html||id.Article@class.content@html||tag.span@p@html");

if(content!=""){
	result = content
	}else{
	if(/window.location.href/.test(result)){
		baseUrl = result.match(/window.location.href='([^']+)';/)[1];
		java.startBrowser("https://www.coolapk.com/link?url="+java.encodeURI("legado://import/addToBookshelf?src="+baseUrl+",{origin:'https://gulongbbs.com/book/'}"),"添加书籍");
		}
		result ="点击购买将书籍添加进书架\n或者刷新正文"
		}
</js>

@js:result
.replace("••","")

.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')

.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

<js>
  //showjname设置章节名显示卷名true or false
  let obj = {showjname: false}
  let $ = JSON.parse(String(result))
  let array = []
  $.volumes.forEach((booklet) => {
  	  java.put('jname',booklet.name)
    array.push({ 
    	    name:'◆◇'+String(booklet.name)+'◇◆',
    	    voltype:true
    	 })
    booklet.chapters.forEach((chapter) => {
href='http://api.ieasou.com/api/bookapp/chargeChapter.m?a=1&autoBuy=0&cid=eef_easou_book&version=002&os=android&udid=1c5b2618a57a0848e2510649dc1e03896f462284&appverion=1122&ch=blf1298_12337_001&session_id=-nEvkqSq_9ZyORN5OoVOOzJ&dzh=1&scp=0&appid=10001&utype=0&rtype=3&pushid=f97b7f81a269472c07708277b7c40b4f&ptype=5&gender=0&userInitPay=3&birt=1658424532472&instime=1658424529924&instId=1658424529924&chType=3&bidType=0&recSw=1&appType=0&gid='+java.get('gid')+'&nid='+chapter.nid+'&sort='+chapter.sort+'&gsort=0&sgsort=0&sequence=4&chapter_name='+chapter.chapter_name
      array.push({
        name: !java.get('jname')?chapter.chapter_name:((obj.showjname?'※'+java.get('jname')+'※ ':'').padStart(3,''))+chapter.chapter_name,
        url: href,
        time:"本章字数:"+String(chapter.wordCount)+"字",
        voltype:false
      })
    })
  })
  array
</js>

bookSourceComment:
在设置书籍变量处填
以下格式：
开始页-结束页
如
10-20
则评论从第10页开始，第20页结束
默认最多从第1页至第10页结束
（更改完书籍变量一定要刷新正文）

ruleContent.nextContentUrl:
<js>
if(baseUrl.match(/page=2/)){
result=""
}else{
allpage=result.match(/class='redtext'>([^<]+)</)[1];
list=[];

len=allpage>10?10:allpage;

start=1;end=len;
if(book.getVariable("custom")!=""){
start=book.getVariable("custom").match(/(\d+)-\d+/)[1];
end=book.getVariable("custom").match(/\d+-(\d+)/)[1];
}

for(i=start;i<=end;i++){
list.push(baseUrl+"&page="+i)
}
list
}
</js>

variableComment:
在设置书籍变量处填
以下格式：
开始页-结束页
如
10-20
则评论从第10页开始，第20页结束
默认最多从第1页至第10页结束
（更改完书籍变量一定要刷新正文）

bookSourceComment:
250101新增番茄来源
250203新增七猫来源
250204新增得间来源
250204新增QQ来源(仅支持免费小说)
250204新增熊猫看书
250210更新日志：
1.采用全新验证方式，之后未填写密钥，可以在阅读页登陆后刷新阅读页面即可！
2.搜索默认改为全局搜索，目前仅支持番茄，七猫，QQ，得间，熊猫，后面的按钮是预设，后期会添加相关来源
3.新增晴天书架功能，在登陆里面点击书架查看

下个版本预计更新内容：
1.预计发现页新增阅读记录和晴天书架栏目
2.预计新增阅读记录，阅读过的书籍可在晴天书架-阅读历史中查看
3.预计新增塔读小说，米读小说，小米阅读，猫眼看书，部分起点

	function parse(data,y){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	  try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
	  try {tag = args[3];
u=tag=="w"?'https://cxb-pro.cread.com/cx/new/catelistnew?uid=127995117&cnid=10013&version=8.1.4&flid='+parseInt(url/10)*10+'&thirdCateId='+url+'&sortType=1&bookStatus='+y+'&wordnumType=0&pageSize=20&curpage={{page}}':y;
 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}
	
	
function FlexBox(title, url, num){
	let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
		 
		 
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
		
		分类list = 开启的分类.split(",")

var 分类result = [];
	
  var i=0;
	 if(分类list[i]<=7){
["🔖男频🔖"].forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x)))
		})
}
   else if(分类list[i]>=8){
	["🔖女频🔖"].forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x)))
		})
		}
	
			
for(i in 分类list){
	 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(分类[分类list[i]]+"🍁连载🔖::::1")))
	a = eval(分类[分类list[i]]+"连载");
	a.forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x,连载分类)))
		})
		
	 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(分类[分类list[i]]+"🍁完结🔖::::1")))
	b = eval(分类[分类list[i]]+"完结");
	b.forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x,完结分类)))
		})
	}
JSON.stringify(分类result)

<js>
jms=JSON.parse(result);
jm=String(jms.body.content).split("a2o@");
function formatSeconds(value) { 
var theTime = parseInt(value);// 秒 
var theTime1 = 0;// 分 
var theTime2 = 0;// 小时 
if(theTime > 60) { 
theTime1 = parseInt(theTime/60); 
theTime = parseInt(theTime%60); 
if(theTime1 > 60) { 
theTime2 = parseInt(theTime1/60); 
theTime1 = parseInt(theTime1%60); } } 
var result = ""+parseInt(theTime)+"秒"; 
if(theTime1 > 0) { 
result = ""+parseInt(theTime1)+"分"+result; } 
if(theTime2 > 0) { 
result = ""+parseInt(theTime2)+"小时"+result; } 
return result; } 
if(jm.length>1){
key="S3VqaWFuZ0FwcDc0NzYwNQ==";
iv=jm[0];
data=jm[1];
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.java.io,
    Packages.java.util,
    Packages.java.util.zip
);
with(javaImport) {
    function decode(content) {
        decode = Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(content));
             byteArrayOutputStream = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
             byteArrayInputStream = new ByteArrayInputStream(decode);
            gZIPInputStream = new GZIPInputStream(byteArrayInputStream);
            bArr = String(" ").getBytes(); 
            while (true) {
                read = gZIPInputStream.read(bArr);
                if (read > 0) {
                    byteArrayOutputStream.write(bArr, 0, read);
                } else {
                    gZIPInputStream.close();
                    byteArrayInputStream.close();
                    byteArrayOutputStream.close();
                    return byteArrayOutputStream.toString();
                }
          }
    }
}

decode(java.aesBase64DecodeToString(data,java.base64Decode(key),"AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding",java.base64Decode(iv)))}
else{"新章节需要解封\n"+"解锁时间还需："+formatSeconds(String(jms.body.left_seconds))}
</js>

<js>
const data = [
    "玄幻魔法",
    "修真武侠",
    "言情小说",
    "历史军事",
    "游戏竞技",
    "科幻空间",
    "悬疑惊悚",
    "同人小说",
    "都市小说",
    "官场职场",
    "穿越时空",
    "青春校园"
];

let categorys = [];
const status = ["连载", "全本"];

for (let i of status) {
    categorys.push({
        title: i,
        url: `/ranking?status=${i}&page={{page}}`,
        style: {
            layout_flexGrow: 1,
            layout_flexBasisPercent: 1
        }
    });
    
    for (let j of data) {
        categorys.push({
            title: j,
            url: `/ranking?category=${j}&status=${i}&page={{page}}`,
            style: {
                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25
            }
        });
    }
}

categorys.push({
    title: "最新",
    url: "/ranking?new=1&page={{page}}",
    style: {
        layout_flexGrow: 1,
        layout_flexBasisPercent: 1
    }
});

for (let j of data) {
    categorys.push({
        title: j,
        url: `/ranking?category=${j}&new=1&page={{page}}`,
        style: {
            layout_flexGrow: 1,
            layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25
        }
    });
}

categorys.push({
    title: "字数",
    url: "/ranking?wordNumber=1&page={{page}}",
    style: {
        layout_flexGrow: 1,
        layout_flexBasisPercent: 1
    }
});

for (let j of data) {
    categorys.push({
        title: j,
        url: `/ranking?category=${j}&wordNumber=1&page={{page}}`,
        style: {
            layout_flexGrow: 1,
            layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25
        }
    });
}

JSON.stringify(categorys);
</js>

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

bookSourceComment:
250101新增番茄来源
250203新增七猫来源
250204新增得间来源
250204新增QQ来源(仅支持免费小说)
250204新增熊猫看书
250210更新日志：
1.采用全新验证方式，之后未填写密钥，可以在阅读页登陆后刷新阅读页面即可！
2.搜索默认改为全局搜索，目前仅支持番茄，七猫，QQ，得间，熊猫，后面的按钮是预设，后期会添加相关来源
3.新增大灰狼书架功能，在登陆里面点击书架查看

下个版本预计更新内容：
1.预计发现页新增阅读记录和大灰狼书架栏目
2.预计新增阅读记录，阅读过的书籍可在大灰狼书架-阅读历史中查看
3.预计新增塔读小说，米读小说，小米阅读，猫眼看书，部分起点

ruleSearch.lastChapter:
<js>
function fq_last() {
	let url = `https://api5-normal-sinfonlineb.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/multi-detail/v/?aid=1967&iid=1&version_code=999&book_id={{$.book_id}}`;
        let last =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data[0]; 
        return last["last_chapter_title"]+" · "+java.timeFormat(last["last_chapter_update_time"]*1000);
	
	}

	
function qm_last() {
	let headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
	sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'

params={'id':{{$.book_id}}, 'imei_ip':'2937357107','teeny_mode':0}

var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {  
  if(param==null) return '';  
  var paramStr = '';  
  var t = typeof (param);  
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {  
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);  
  } else {  
    for (var i in param) {  
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);  
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);  
    }  
  }  
  return paramStr;  
};
paramSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key));
headerSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))
params['sign']=paramSign;
headers['sign']=headerSign;
let url = "https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/book/detail?"+urlEncode(params);
option = {'headers':headers};
let last =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url+','+JSON.stringify(option)))["data"]["book"];
let last2 =  `${last["latest_chapter_title"]} · ${java.timeFormat(last['update_time']*1000)} `
	return last2
	}
	//如果要显示最新章节，请去除注释，去除会影响搜索速度
//if ('{{$.source}}'=='番茄'){
//	'番茄:'+fq_last();
//	} else if ('{{$.source}}'=='七猫'){
//	'七猫:'+qm_last();
//	} else {
	'{{$.source}} {{$.last_chapter_title}}'
//		}

</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: [property="og:novel:author"]@content
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

loginUrl:
<js>
function login(){
userInfo=source.getLoginInfoMap()

UNE=userInfo['账号']
PWD=userInfo['密码']
url = "https://www.myrics.com/complete/email/";
body="email="+java.encodeURI(UNE)+"&password="+java.encodeURI(PWD);

c=java.post(url,body,{"referer":"https://www.myrics.com/login"});
x = c.cookies().csrftoken;
java.log(x)
c=String(c.cookies()).replace(/\{|\}/g,'').replace(/,/g,';')
Cookie={
	"cookie":String(c),
	"x-csrftoken":String(x)
	}
header = JSON.stringify(Cookie)
source.putLoginHeader(header)
}
</js>

{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

bookSourceComment:
250101新增番茄来源
250203新增七猫来源
250204新增得间来源
250204新增QQ来源(仅支持免费小说)
250204新增熊猫看书
250210更新日志：
1.采用全新验证方式，之后未填写密钥，可以在阅读页登陆后刷新阅读页面即可！
2.搜索默认改为全局搜索，目前仅支持番茄，七猫，QQ，得间，熊猫，后面的按钮是预设，后期会添加相关来源
3.新增晴天书架功能，在登陆里面点击书架查看

下个版本预计更新内容：
1.预计发现页新增阅读记录和晴天书架栏目
2.预计新增阅读记录，阅读过的书籍可在晴天书架-阅读历史中查看
3.预计新增塔读小说，米读小说，小米阅读，猫眼看书，部分起点
